hotels.title: Vibrant Box Hill Art Series Escape with Stunning Rooftop Pool & Two Onsite Restaurants
hotels.description: Sleek and stylish in aura, embrace the abstract spirit of this artistic retreat nestled in the heart of Box Hill, approximately 30 minutes outside of Melbourne. Celebrating Chinese-Australian artist Zhong Chen with a collection of his playful, vibrant artwork adorning the walls, this contemporary hotel unfolds a canvas of modern design and comfort in every suite, complete with an in-room art library. Soak up the spectacular sight of the Melbourne skyline when you lounge by the rooftop pool perched on the hotel's 24th floor and dine heartily at the onsite Whitehorse Chloe or the Golden Lily Chinese restaurant, serving Asian-inspired dishes. When you're ready to explore, find yourself within easy reach of Box Hill's shopping precinct and the scenic Box Hill Gardens.
